channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Management of Pharmaceutical Household Waste - Limiting Environmental Impacts of Unused or Expired Medicine
item.description: Management of Pharmaceutical Household Waste - Limiting Environmental Impacts of Unused or Expired Medicine by Environment Directorate has an embargo on Tuesday 10 May 2022 at 8:00.

item.title: Building on COVID-19's Innovation Momentum for Digital, Inclusive Education
item.description: Building on COVID-19's Innovation Momentum for Digital, Inclusive Education by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Wednesday 11 May 2022 at 9:00.

item.title: Les impôts sur les salaires 2022 - L'impact du COVID-19 sur le coin fiscal dans les pays de l’OCDE
item.description: Les impôts sur les salaires 2022 - L'impact du COVID-19 sur le coin fiscal dans les pays de l’OCDE by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Tuesday 24 May 2022 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: Taxing Wages 2022 - Impact of COVID-19 on the Tax Wedge in OECD Countries
item.description: Taxing Wages 2022 - Impact of COVID-19 on the Tax Wedge in OECD Countries by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Tuesday 24 May 2022 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: OECD Reviews of Innovation Policy: Germany - Building Agility for Successful Transitions
item.description: OECD Reviews of Innovation Policy: Germany - Building Agility for Successful Transitions by Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry has an embargo on Monday 6 June 2022 at 0:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry

item.title: Digital Trade Review of Brazil
item.description: Digital Trade Review of Brazil by Trade and Agriculture Directorate has an embargo on Friday 10 June 2022 at 8:00.

item.title: Tax Administration 2022 - Comparative Information on OECD and other Advanced and Emerging Economies
item.description: Tax Administration 2022 - Comparative Information on OECD and other Advanced and Emerging Economies by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Wednesday 15 June 2022 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: Gender Equality in Peru - Towards a Better Sharing of Paid and Unpaid Work
item.description: Gender Equality in Peru - Towards a Better Sharing of Paid and Unpaid Work by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Friday 24 June 2022 at 12:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs
